text: fima lakum -'ayaha almuminuna- fi shan almunafiqin 'iidh akhtalaftum farqatayna: firqatan taqul biqitalihim wa'ukhraa la taqul badhlka? wallah taealaa qad 'awqaeahum fi alkufr waldalal bsbb su' 'aemalihim. 'atuduwn hudayatan min saraf allah taealaa qalbah ean diniha? wamin khadhalah allah ean dinihi, waitibae ma 'amarah bihi, fala tariq lah 'iilaa alhda
